name: Submerged (itch) (Charlie Bennett)
description:
Submerged was created for a student project the constraints of this project were
- A focus on narrative
- A 60 Second Playtime

The game revolves around a stranded marine biologist who's been sent out into the ocean to studying a pod of migrating whales but ends up being nudged by one which leads to a head injury, from there the game begins.
